verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came אַחַר֙ <S%H310><s%> And it came to pass after הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וְהָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> that God נִסָּ֖ה <S%H5254><s%> did tempt אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַבְרָהָ֑ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> unto him Abraham וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H2009><s%> Here

וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> Take now נָ֠א <S%H4994><s%> now אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּנְךָ֨ <S%H1121><s%> thy son אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְחִֽידְךָ֤ <S%H3173><s%> thine only אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom אָהַ֙בְתָּ֙ <S%H157><s%> whom thou lovest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִצְחָ֔ק <S%H3327><s%> [son] Isaac וְלֶךְ־ <S%H1980><s%> and go לְךָ֔ אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land הַמֹּרִיָּ֑ה <S%H4179><s%> of Moriah וְהַעֲלֵ֤הוּ <S%H5927><s%> and offer him שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there לְעֹלָ֔ה <S%H5930><s%> there for a burnt offering עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> on אַחַ֣ד <S%H259><s%> upon one הֶֽהָרִ֔ים <S%H2022><s%> of the mountains אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> of which אֹמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> which I will tell אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֨ם <S%H7925><s%> rose up early אַבְרָהָ֜ם <S%H85><s%> And Abraham בַּבֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וַֽיַּחֲבֹשׁ֙ <S%H2280><s%> and saddled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲמֹר֔וֹ <S%H2543><s%> his ass וַיִּקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁנֵ֤י <S%H8147><s%> two נְעָרָיו֙ <S%H5288><s%> of his young men אִתּ֔וֹ <S%H854><s%> for וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> יִצְחָ֣ק <S%H3327><s%> with him and Isaac בְּנ֑וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son וַיְבַקַּע֙ <S%H1234><s%> and clave עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> the wood עֹלָ֔ה <S%H5930><s%> for the burnt offering וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> and rose up וַיֵּ֔לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> unto the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> of which אָֽמַר־ <S%H559><s%> had told ל֥וֹ הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of which God

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֗י <S%H7992><s%> Then on the third וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> lifted up אַבְרָהָ֧ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵינָ֛יו <S%H5869><s%> his eyes וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> and saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> the place מֵרָחֹֽק׃ <S%H7350><s%> afar off

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אַבְרָהָ֜ם <S%H85><s%> And Abraham אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his נְעָרָ֗יו <S%H5288><s%> unto his young men שְׁבוּ־ <S%H3427><s%> Abide לָכֶ֥ם פֹּה֙ <S%H6311><s%> here עִֽם־ <S%H5973><s%> with הַחֲמ֔וֹר <S%H2543><s%> ye here with the ass וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I וְהַנַּ֔עַר <S%H5288><s%> and I and the lad נֵלְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> will go עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against כֹּ֑ה <S%H3541><s%> yonder וְנִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֖ה <S%H7812><s%> and worship וְנָשׁ֥וּבָה <S%H7725><s%> and come again אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> took אַבְרָהָ֜ם <S%H85><s%> And Abraham אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> the wood הָעֹלָ֗ה <S%H5930><s%> of the burnt offering וַיָּ֙שֶׂם֙ <S%H7760><s%> and laid עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יִצְחָ֣ק <S%H3327><s%> [it] upon Isaac בְּנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> and he took בְּיָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> the fire וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽמַּאֲכֶ֑לֶת <S%H3979><s%> and a knife וַיֵּלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> walked שְׁנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H8147><s%> both יַחְדָּֽו׃ <S%H3162><s%> of them together

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake יִצְחָ֜ק <S%H3327><s%> And Isaac אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַבְרָהָ֤ם <S%H85><s%> unto Abraham אָבִיו֙ <S%H1><s%> his father וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אָבִ֔י <S%H1><s%> My father וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said הִנֶּ֣נִּֽי <S%H2009><s%> Here בְנִ֑י <S%H1121><s%> Here [am] I my son וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold הָאֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> Behold the fire וְהָ֣עֵצִ֔ים <S%H6086><s%> and the wood וְאַיֵּ֥ה <S%H346><s%> where הַשֶּׂ֖ה <S%H7716><s%> but where [is] the lamb לְעֹלָֽה׃ <S%H5930><s%> the burnt

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said אַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> And Abraham אֱלֹהִ֞ים <S%H430><s%> God יִרְאֶה־ <S%H7200><s%> will provide לּ֥וֹ הַשֶּׂ֛ה <S%H7716><s%> himself a lamb לְעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> for a burnt offering בְּנִ֑י <S%H1121><s%> My son וַיֵּלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> walked שְׁנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H8147><s%> both of them יַחְדָּֽו׃ <S%H3162><s%> together

וַיָּבֹ֗אוּ <S%H935><s%> And they came אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמָּקוֹם֮ <S%H4725><s%> to the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> of which אָֽמַר־ <S%H559><s%> had told ל֣וֹ הָאֱלֹהִים֒ <S%H430><s%> which God וַיִּ֨בֶן <S%H1129><s%> built שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> there אַבְרָהָם֙ <S%H85><s%> him of and Abraham אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> an altar וַֽיַּעֲרֹ֖ךְ <S%H6186><s%> in order אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֵצִ֑ים <S%H6086><s%> the wood וַֽיַּעֲקֹד֙ <S%H6123><s%> and bound אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִצְחָ֣ק <S%H3327><s%> Isaac בְּנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and laid אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> him on the altar מִמַּ֖עַל <S%H4605><s%> upon לָעֵצִֽים׃ <S%H6086><s%> the wood

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> stretched forth אַבְרָהָם֙ <S%H85><s%> And Abraham אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand וַיִּקַּ֖ח <S%H3947><s%> and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽמַּאֲכֶ֑לֶת <S%H3979><s%> the knife לִשְׁחֹ֖ט <S%H7819><s%> to slay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> called אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> But מַלְאַ֤ךְ <S%H4397><s%> And the angel יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> unto him out of heaven וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אַבְרָהָ֣ם ׀ <S%H85><s%> Abraham אַבְרָהָ֑ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H2009><s%> Here

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> Lay יָֽדְךָ֙ <S%H3027><s%> not thine hand אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> upon הַנַּ֔עַר <S%H5288><s%> the lad וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> neither do thou ל֖וֹ מְא֑וּמָּה <S%H3972><s%> any thing כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for עַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> unto him for now יָדַ֗עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> I know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יְרֵ֤א <S%H3373><s%> that thou fearest אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> God אַ֔תָּה <S%H859><s%> you וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> seeing thou hast not חָשַׂ֛כְתָּ <S%H2820><s%> withheld אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּנְךָ֥ <S%H1121><s%> thy son אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְחִידְךָ֖ <S%H3173><s%> thine only מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> lifted up אַבְרָהָ֜ם <S%H85><s%> And Abraham אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵינָ֗יו <S%H5869><s%> his eyes וַיַּרְא֙ <S%H7200><s%> and looked וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold אַ֔יִל <S%H352><s%> [him] a ram אַחַ֕ר <S%H310><s%> and behold behind נֶאֱחַ֥ז <S%H270><s%> caught בַּסְּבַ֖ךְ <S%H5442><s%> in a thicket בְּקַרְנָ֑יו <S%H7161><s%> by his horns וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went אַבְרָהָם֙ <S%H85><s%> and Abraham וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאַ֔יִל <S%H352><s%> the ram וַיַּעֲלֵ֥הוּ <S%H5927><s%> and offered him up לְעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> for a burnt offering תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> in the stead בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> of his son

וַיִּקְרָ֧א <S%H7121><s%> called אַבְרָהָ֛ם <S%H85><s%> And Abraham שֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> the name הַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> of that place הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יִרְאֶ֑ה <S%H7200><s%> it shall be seen אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> as יֵאָמֵ֣ר <S%H559><s%> it is said הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> [to] this day בְּהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> In the mount יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יֵרָאֶֽה׃ <S%H7200><s%> will be provided

וַיִּקְרָ֛א <S%H7121><s%> called מַלְאַ֥ךְ <S%H4397><s%> And the angel יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַבְרָהָ֑ם <S%H85><s%> unto Abraham שֵׁנִ֖ית <S%H8145><s%> the second time מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> out of heaven

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And said בִּ֥י נִשְׁבַּ֖עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> By myself have I sworn נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> for יַ֚עַן <S%H3282><s%> because אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> you עָשִׂ֙יתָ֙ <S%H6213><s%> thou hast done אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and hast not חָשַׂ֖כְתָּ <S%H2820><s%> withheld אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּנְךָ֥ <S%H1121><s%> thy son אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְחִידֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3173><s%> thine only

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> indeed בָרֵ֣ךְ <S%H1288><s%> That in blessing אֲבָרֶכְךָ֗ <S%H1288><s%> I will bless וְהַרְבָּ֨ה <S%H7235><s%> thee and in multiplying אַרְבֶּ֤ה <S%H7235><s%> I will multiply אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> זַרְעֲךָ֙ <S%H2233><s%> thy seed כְּכוֹכְבֵ֣י <S%H3556><s%> as the stars הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the heaven וְכַח֕וֹל <S%H2344><s%> and as the sand אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שְׂפַ֣ת <S%H8193><s%> shore הַיָּ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> which [is] upon the sea וְיִרַ֣שׁ <S%H3423><s%> shall possess זַרְעֲךָ֔ <S%H2233><s%> and thy seed אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> שַׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> the gate אֹיְבָֽיו׃ <S%H341><s%> of his enemies

וְהִתְבָּרֲכ֣וּ <S%H1288><s%> be blessed בְזַרְעֲךָ֔ <S%H2233><s%> And in thy seed כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all גּוֹיֵ֣י <S%H1471><s%> shall all the nations הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth עֵ֕קֶב <S%H6118><s%> because אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you שָׁמַ֖עְתָּ <S%H8085><s%> thou hast obeyed בְּקֹלִֽי׃ <S%H6963><s%> my voice

וַיָּ֤שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> returned אַבְרָהָם֙ <S%H85><s%> So Abraham אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his נְעָרָ֔יו <S%H5288><s%> unto his young men וַיָּקֻ֛מוּ <S%H6965><s%> and they rose up וַיֵּלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> and went יַחְדָּ֖ו <S%H3162><s%> together אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בְּאֵ֣ר שָׁ֑בַע <S%H884><s%> to Beersheba וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> dwelt אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> and Abraham בִּבְאֵ֥ר שָֽׁבַע׃ <S%H884><s%> at Beersheba פ
